```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(readr)
library(plotly)

library(dplyr)

# all data
data <- read_csv("data/data2011.csv")
data$Overall_Rank <- as.numeric(data$Overall_Rank)

# standard map criteria
# light grey boundaries
l <- list(color = toRGB("grey"), width = 0.5)

# specify map projection/options
g <- list(
  showframe = FALSE,
  showcoastlines = TRUE,
  projection = list(type = 'robinson')
)
```

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

###  <a href="https://goodcountry.org/index/about-the-index" target="_blank">The Good Country 2011 Index</a>

```{r munging}

info <- reactive({
  
if(input$category=="Overall")  {
df <- data[c(1:163),c(1,2,4:11)]
df$hover <- with(df, paste(Country, '<br>', "Overall", Overall_Rank, "<br>", "Science/Tech", ST_Rank, "<br>",
                                       "Culture", CU_Rank, "<br>", "Peace/Security", PS_Rank,
                                       "<br>", "World Order", WO_Rank,  "<br>","Climate", PC_Rank, "<br>",
                                       "Prosperity", PE_Rank,  "<br>","Health", HW_Rank))
}
  
  (glimpse(df))
  info=list(df=df)
  return(info)

})



# toplevel$hover <- with(toplevel, paste(Country, '<br>', "Overall", Overall_Rank, "<br>", "Science/Tech", ST_Rank, "<br>",
#                                        "Culture", CU_Rank, "<br>", "Peace/Security", PS_Rank,
#                                        "<br>", "World Order", WO_Rank,  "<br>","Climate", PC_Rank, "<br>",
#                                        "Prosperity", PE_Rank,  "<br>","Health", HW_Rank))

renderPlotly({
  
  req(info())
  info()$df %>% 
        plot_ly( z = Overall_Rank, text = hover, locations = ISOcode, type = 'choropleth',
        color = Overall_Rank, colors = 'RdYlGn', marker = list(line = l), showscale=F, reversescale = TRUE
) %>%
  layout(title = 'Overall Index - Hover for Details',
         geo = g)
})
```
